profile_positions.description:
S[&]T is a privately owned company in Delft, The Netherlands, with offices in Oslo and Rome. 

Conducting high-tech projects using data from space for a more efficient, healthier and safer life on Earth. 

Since the founding in 2000, Science [&] Technology has grown into a diverse group of 125 professionals holding PhD and/or MSc degrees in Aerospace Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics and Physics to work on projects with and for ESA/ ESTEC, ASTRON, ASML, AIRBUS, CGI, Heineken, Siemens, Thales Alenia Space, TNO, ABN AMRO, Philips, KNMI, Neafield Instruments, IBM, and many others.

Our Brands:

STEP - Talent Acquisition / Experts Pool - Where the heart for technology meets the heart for people.
 
We understand that engineers are people first, and we place importance and focus on ensuring that the whole picture makes sense for our colleagues and partners.

S[&]T Data Innovation Centre - Specialize in the development of sensor data-based decision support applications. (www.stcorp.nl)

Orbital Eye - Earth observation based monitoring of infrastructure, assets and environment.
(www.orbitaleye.nl)

Sensar - Millimeter changes from space | Surface, Buildings and Infrastructure | Measure what is measurable. (www.sensar.nl)

SPECTRAL Industries - High-tech company that develops unique optical sensor systems for non-contact elemental analysis. (www.spectralindustries.com)

Euretos - Data driven insights for disease and drug research. (www.euretos.com)

Meandair - Weather Nowcasting. (www.meandair.com)

Fast Micro - Committed to world-class innovations in surface particle measurements, so our customers can accomplish breakthroughs in cleanliness control. (www.fast-micro.com)
profile_positions.title: Senior Talent Acquisition/Account Manager

profile_positions.description: Omnia Retail is the company behind Europe's first dynamic pricing software. Built by two industry experts — one a retail software engineer, the other a retail strategy consultant — Omnia was created to help each founder’s respective clients achieve more with their pricing. Omnia’s mission is to help retailers and brands take control of their pricing and grow profitably with automation and insights, and the enterprise-ready software makes it easy for teams to manage pricing without the need for IT.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
Washington Frank International is a trusted recruitment partner delivering niche IT resources to a diverse range of businesses solely across the ERP technology ecosystem.

Our offices around the world, are staffed with experienced recruitment consultants; allowing us to provide the best information technology recruitment services to suit the needs of our clients.

We are the recruitment partner of choice for 1000’s of various ERP partners, customers and ISV's worldwide. As specialists in ERP recruitment, we have unrivalled knowledge of the marketplace and possess a unique ability to identify permanent or contract ERP professionals. Wherever you're located and whatever stage you are in the ERP life-cycle, our multilingual recruitment consultants know how to help you to achieve your recruitment goals.

Products we specialise in:

- SAGE ( X3, 100, 1000 )
- SAP
- Exact
- Oracle (JDE, E-Business Suite & Fusion…)
- Infor (M3, LN)
- AFAS
profile_positions.title: ERP Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Recruiting for Sales, Operations, Partner Services, Customer Service and HR positions in the Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, Austria and Portugal.

 Managing the full Recruitment Cycle: sourcing, screening and guiding candidates through the interview process from the first contact to the hiring or rejection
 Participating as one of the coordinators of the Referral Programme 
  Collaborating with the Hiring Managers to understand the recruitment needs and align with the department's objectives. Building a relationship based on trust and teamwork
 Building an effective work relationship with external suppliers
profile_positions.title: Corporate Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
Specialising in English, bi-lingual & multi-lingual executive search, recruitment, contracting & temporary staffing.

Selecting and recruiting candidates at all professional levels, in order to meet the client’s job requirements in an accurate and timely manner. Managing all stages of the recruitment process and maintaining ongoing relationships with clients and candidates in order to ensure the right match.

The know-how of Blue Lynx spans a broad spectrum of diverse disciplines: Accountancy, Sales, Logistics, Marketing, Engineering, HR, IT, Legal, CSR, Secretarial/Admin as well all Office Support; across a multi-sector canvas of the world’s leading industries. This indicates the scope of Blue Lynx in its ability to provide seamless consulting solutions to international business within The Netherlands.

Recruitment:

	Qualify a job vacancy with the client 
	Source and screen candidates using available resources and databases
	Conduct interviews – face to face, Skype, telephone
	Write candidates profile 
	Represent and introduce candidates to clients
	Maintain recruitment administration keeping it up to date
	Confirm interviews with candidates and clients
	Confirm and close contract details with clients and candidates
	Prepare contract and finance information
	Work in close cooperation with other recruitment consultants
	Attend company trade fairs
	Manage a portfolio of clients

Admissions Administration:

	Register and update candidate details in the database
	Monitor and verify the validity of work permits 

Sales/Account Management:

	Signal sales lead
	Sell the job to the candidate and the candidate to the client
	Build and maintain professional relationships with clients based on trust and a thorough understanding of the requirements
	React quickly to new vacancies
	Visit clients to build and maintain relationships
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Recruitment:

	Qualify a job vacancy with the client to the full
	Source using all available resources and databases
	Conduct interviews (telephone and face to face)
	Categorize and keyword CVs
	Write candidates profile 
	Present candidates to clients
	Maintain all related administration up to date and logged in the company database
	Reply to all applications
	Confirm interviews with both candidates and clients and coach candidates through the interview process
	Negotiate contract terms and conditions with clients and candidates
	Send all contractual information to the HR & Finance Departments
	Work in close cooperation with other recruitment consultants 

Sales/Account Management:

	Signal sales lead to the Business Developer
	Sell the job to the candidate and the candidate to the client
	Build and maintain professional relationships with clients based on trust and a thorough understanding of the requirements
	React quickly to new vacancies
	Visit clients to build and maintain ongoing report
profile_positions.title: Junior Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.description:
	Register and check incoming CVs in the CRM
	Maintain accurate and up-to-date administration in the CRM throughout the whole recruitment cycle
	Maintain email correspondence with candidates, organising CVs and other admission documents
	Call and meet with newly registered candidates for a general meeting
	Liaise with candidates and by telephone and email to schedule interviews
	Maintain constant communications with recruiters regarding newly registered candidates
	Answer general telephone calls and inform callers about the services
	Coordinate appointments
	Work in close cooperation with recruitment consultants
	Prepare and advertise job vacancies on websites
	Source, qualify and select suitable candidates for job vacancies from the database and the job site CV databases
	Welcome visitors and general day to day office duties
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Support & Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Recruiting to the Silver Circle law firms in the UK market.

	Prepare and advertise job vacancies in the internal platform and other job boards
	Source in the internal platform and other job boards
	Target the CVs imported from the external job boards
	Screen applications
	Organise the CV’s in the internal platform
	Schedule and manage interviews via Skype
	Build the candidates profiles on the internal platform in order to send to the clients
	Shortlist the suitable candidates in the internal platform and send to the client
	Answering to candidates queries via telephone and email
	Liaise with clients via telephone and email (answer to questions, discuss candidates, manage the candidate’s attendance to the interview with the client)
	Maintain the candidate’s information and status in the process updated in the internal platform
	Inbox management (send assignments to the candidates, receive information from the candidates, schedule interviews, prepare the candidates for the interview with the client)
	Insert candidate’s assignments and motivational notes on the internal platform 
	Work closely with all the team members, helping in a variety of tasks
profile_positions.title: Talent Manager (Internship Erasmus+ Programme)

profile_positions.description:
     Teach classes for two courses (Human Resources Management and Training Management)
	Prepare the classes by creating several contents and activities to the students 
	Enrol in academic activities, such as conferences and seminars
	Give tutoring and support to the students
	Attend to the team and department meetings
	Correct and grade daily class activities and papers
	Support the head Professor in a variety of tasks (prepare the students evaluation, insert grades in the system, write exams, supervise the students during the exams)
	Inbox management (respond to students and other colleagues regarding a diversity of subjects)
profile_positions.title: Guest Assistant Professor

company.name: Saúdis - Clínica de Saúde e Neurologia

profile_positions.company: Saúdis - Clínica de Saúde e Neurologia
profile_positions.description:
	Implement new HR processes and practices 
	Improve the existing HR processes and practices 
	Create, improve and translate the existing onboarding documents and other regulations
	Help with the onboarding of the new employees and interns
	Organise and manage all the employee’s, candidate’s and client’s documents and information
	Plan and execute a recruitment & selection process (post jobs, register incoming CVs, schedule and manage interviews, send rejections emails) 
	Organise and implement a job description process for all the existing professions 
	Help with the administrative tasks (liaising with the clients, doctors and therapists, both in person and via telephone and email, billing, schedule appointments, welcome visitors)
	Inbox Management for the HR department and the rest of the Clinic
	Ensure that the doctors and therapists have all the required supplies
profile_positions.title: HRM Intern
